name: Planet Escape (josefmcgrath)
description:
Planet Escape is a first-person shooter made during my second year of university. You play as a military operative working at science facility, the experiments being run there cause the scientists to mutate beyond recognition. Find the key to the supply yard and survive the wave of enemies to escape the planet. 

There's just one catch, the only thing keeping you alive is your adrenaline, let the meter get too full and your heart will explode, let it get too empty and your heart will stop. What's worse is your perception of time will change depending on the amount of adrenaline you have. 

Good Luck
